name: Scheduled Timelapse
tagline: My Final Project for the Udacity Nano Degree
body:
### About

This capstone project provides a way to create amazing High resolution photos with older phones/tablets.
You schedule how often you wish to take a photo, and put your phone in position(plug in power if taking pictures of something like every moonrise, or of a flower blooming.

### User Manual

This app was design to put older phones to use doing something cool.

### When to Use

1. Long Time lapse(minutes, hours, days, weeks) Long.
1. Time lapse of construction of a building

### When not to use

1. In your hands
1. Long term without sufficient power
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
